name: RoboRun (VEE TEE)
description:
Robo-Run

 A typical platformer with neon art style visuals mixed with low poly models...play as the blue Robot and try to beat best your enemies and complete each level as fast as you can... use grenades and Laser bolts to take down enemies which reward You with more ammo or just avoid enemies in general be careful though because some enemies hold keys to unlock special doors needed to progress

_avoid anything red

_use health orbs to replenish health
